issue.title: facebook.com
issue.body:
### Issue URL (Incorrect Blocking) [http://facebook.com](https://adguardteam.github.io/AnonymousRedirect/redirect.html?url=http%3A%2F%2Ffacebook.com) ### Comment > Every time my iPhone updates, I start getting tons of ads online. When everything is working correctly, I NEVER get ads on FB. As soon as the phone updates they start all over. I reached out last time and someone gave me instructions that worked and fixed it but I don’t remember how. I’m sorry! ### Screenshots
Screenshot 1 ![Screenshot 1](https://cdn.adguard.info/sitereports/ls9nt7xg4sgwsow8s40884sg488wg4kmr31ajsd2cg.png?nc=1)

### Issue URL (Annoyance) [https://7mmtv.sx/ja/censored_content/68586/SOE-846.html](https://adguardteam.github.io/AnonymousRedirect/redirect.html?url=https%3A%2F%2F7mmtv.sx%2Fja%2Fcensored_content%2F68586%2FSOE-846.html) ### Comment > Pressing the play button on the player will cause a redirect and take you to another page. > The same goes for https://7mm003.cc ### Screenshots
Screenshot 1 ![Screenshot 1](https://cdn.adguard.info/sitereports/ttpnjip176og4o8gcckowow4k08kgg010vzq5uxkmh.jpg?nc=1)
Screenshot 2 ![Screenshot 2](https://cdn.adguard.info/sitereports/evcoejm6r2804wo4gg8cgskcgks08o0rz7l0bdt4i8.jpg?nc=1)
Screenshot 3 ![Screenshot 3](https://cdn.adguard.info/sitereports/7ghaq2tz8q4okcs0sco4ooo0k88k40oqq3vp8h0b7k.jpg?nc=1)
